name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Nagato
summary:
A special training pack for your avatar!

Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Nagato (Reanimation)!
Purchasing this DLC will make him available as a master at the Ninjutsu Library, ready to offer Ninjutsu training.

Train with Nagato (Reanimation) to acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!
